title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Donate
body: Donate       Your donations make a real difference in directly helping the parks! You can donate in many ways:  - give a general cash donation - make a gift to honor or remember someone or a special event - request donations in lieu of gifts - support a specific park fund or program - make a bequest - leave a legacy - leave a gift of property  You can donate to the Sequoia Parks Conservancy or to the park itself.  To donate directly to the park (we cannot accept donations online), mail a check to:  ATTN: Park Donation Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks 47050 Generals Highway Three Rivers, CA 93271  Many park programs and projects can use a financial boost, including bear management, education programs in the parks and at valley schools, trail building and maintenance, habitat restoration, and search-and-rescue. Let us know your particular interest and we can describe related programs that could benefit from your help. Click this contact us link or call 559-565-3136. The wildlife, ecosystems, staff, and visitors of Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks appreciate your support!
